data.message: 5 of my friends have told me my account has been hacked, again.  Do I report that or do they?  And why can the people who are doing this be tracked??  And stopped???

replies.message: Hey Renda. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: on.fb.me/XqYbih. -Elizabeth
Renda Macintosh Lowe this particular list of post are thanks to veterans for serving our country. It’s not about your personal problems.

^well their customer service is HORRENDOUS and there's no way to get help otherwise. veterans get thanked every .0364 seconds get over it. theyre not the only people in this country that make the world go round.

IF I see someone's account open, I just copy name of that stranger and log out and report to them kindly not to forget to log off your account on share computers like Apple Store, libraries, offices, etc.
to all vets... thank you for your service! and may god bless you      thanks to facebook
